title: In the beginning...
content:
...there was a font that I couldn't identify (the BEGINNING font).  
But with the help of all the kind folks on Typophile, I'm hoping that it might be...

(thanks).

Font: 

 Geared 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054422/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

comments.content: [Geared](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054422/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=geared) donation-ware by Ben Dalrymple for Lost Type Co-op, manually roughened.
